mapper.select: SELECT ID , USER_NAME , PHONE_NO , EMAIL FROM USER_INFO WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT T.ROLE_CD , T.ROLE_NAME , LISTAGG(T.SYSTEM_GRP_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY T.SYSTEM_GRP_CD) AS SYSTEM_GRP_CD , LISTAGG(T.SYSTEM_GRP_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY T.SYSTEM_GRP_NAME) AS SYSTEM_GRP_NAME , T.SYSTEM_CD , T.SYSTEM_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.ROLE_CD , (SELECT ROLE_NAME FROM ROLE_INFO WHERE ROLE_CD = A.ROLE_CD) AS ROLE_NAME , A.SYSTEM_GRP_CD , B.SYSTEM_GRP_NAME , LISTAGG(A.SYSTEM_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_CD) AS SYSTEM_CD , LISTAGG(B.SYSTEM_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY B.SYSTEM_NAME) AS SYSTEM_NAME FROM ROLESYSTEM_INFO A , SYSTEM_INFO B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.SYSTEM_CD = B.SYSTEM_CD AND A.SYSTEM_GRP_CD = B.SYSTEM_GRP_CD AND A.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND A.ROLE_CD = ( SELECT C1.ROLE_CD FROM ROLEUSER_INFO C1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND C1.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND C1.USER_ID = ( SELECT ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password}) ) GROUP BY A.ROLE_CD, A.SYSTEM_GRP_CD, B.SYSTEM_GRP_NAME ) T GROUP BY T.ROLE_CD, T.ROLE_NAME, T.SYSTEM_CD, T.SYSTEM_NAME
